channel.title: Am I Wrong? Sports Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the “Am I Wrong? Sports Podcast”. On this show we will do a deep dive into the world of sports including the NFL, NBA, NCAA, UFC, Boxing and more. Depending on the season of course. We both love different teams and players, so the arguments come natural to us. Listen in and we will figure out who is really wrong.
channel.author: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
channel.itunes:author: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the “Am I Wrong? Sports Podcast”. On this show we will do a deep dive into the world of sports including the NFL, NBA, NCAA, UFC, Boxing and more. Depending on the season of course. We both love different teams and players, so the arguments come natural to us. Listen in and we will figure out who is really wrong.

item.title: EP.59: JAIRE VS DIGGS, STEELERS FUTURE, TRADES, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: "Don't think about it too much too much too muuuuuuch" is all packers fans can do at this point. A big trade or signing is our only hope. Is it too late to get Davante Adams back? Steelers fans are also doomed for this season as we have seen right now these QBs are not gonna get the job done this year. It looks like the super bowl chase is down to the Eagles, Vikings, Bills, and Chiefs with a few others if they get hot at the right time. Tune in for more!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya

item.title: EP.58: CAN THE PACKERS BOUNCE BACK, WILL TJ WATT SAVE THE STEELERS SEASON, LAKERS, NFL TRADES, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: In this episode Griffin begs the packers to make a move while Joe hangs onto the very little hope he has about the steelers future. We discuss the lakers looking bad and the NFL trades that were made. We look into next weeks matchup and give our insights and predictions for week 8
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Griffin begs the packers to make a move while Joe hangs onto the very little hope he has about the steelers future. We discuss the lakers looking bad and the NFL trades that were made. We look into next weeks matchup and give our insights and predictions for week 8

item.title: EP.57: PACKERS LOSE AGAIN, STEELERS UPSET, POTENTIAL TRADES, UPCOMING MATCHUPS, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: Griffin is in shambles after Green Bay loses two straight games and he questions if they have what it takes to beat the commanders. Joe is riding high on the steelers upset win. We discuss other week 6 action as well as upcoming week 7 matchups. We talk about the world cup and which teams are looking good. Tennessee beating Alabama and storming the field was a sight to see. Tune in to find out more!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya

We discuss other week 6 action as well as upcoming week 7 matchups. We talk about the world cup and which teams are looking good. Tennessee beating Alabama and storming the field was a sight to see. Tune in to find out more!

item.title: EP.56: PACKERS LOSE, STEELERS COLD STREAK, WEMBY, AWARD PREDICTIONS AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: TUNE IN AND GET ALL THE ACTION FROM WEEK 5
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: TUNE IN AND GET ALL THE ACTION FROM WEEK 5

item.title: EP.55: WEEK 5 MATCHUPS, COWBOYS SUCCESS, TUA, STEELERS LOSE, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: This week we discuss all the week 4 action and the future week 5 matchups. Tune in!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss all the week 4 action and the future week 5 matchups. Tune in!

item.title: EP.54: BRADY VS RODGERS, STEELERS STRUGGLE, MIAMI MAGIC, EAGLES SUPER BOWL CONTENTION, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: With the eagles and dolphins looking strong who is the best undefeated team? Did the Packers deserve their win at Tampa Bay or was the missing Bucs WRs a valid excuse? Should the steelers move on and start Kenny Pickett? Tune in and find out more!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: With the eagles and dolphins looking strong who is the best undefeated team? Did the Packers deserve their win at Tampa Bay or was the missing Bucs WRs a valid excuse? Should the steelers move on and start Kenny Pickett? Tune in and find out more!

item.title: EP.53: DOLPHINS SHOW OUT, STEELERS WANT PICKETT, TREY LANCE INJURY, PACKERS VS BUCS, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: Tune in and get all the action from week one! From the Dolphins comeback to the Steelers struggles. Get our predictions for next weeks big games like the Packers vs Buccaneers. We transcend just an NFL podcast because we get into many sports but you can never have enough NFL talk. Tune in now!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: Tune in and get all the action from week one! From the Dolphins comeback to the Steelers struggles. Get our predictions for next weeks big games like the Packers vs Buccaneers. We transcend just an NFL podcast because we get into many sports but you can never have enough NFL talk. Tune in now!

item.title: EP.52: SEATTLES HUGE WIN, PACKERS STRUGGLES, STEELERS DEFENSE, MAJOR PERFORMANCES AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: Week one is here and football is finally back in our lives. After that Monday night game I'm sure we are all shocked especially with the Broncos weird decision not to call a timeout and their weirder decision to kick a 64 yard field goal. Anyways we cover A LOT of football in this episode and Griffin explains why the Packers beatdown is encouraging. Joe goes over why the Steelers win is a big loss and trust me we get into a lot of other topics. TUNE IN!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: Week one is here and football is finally back in our lives. After that Monday night game I'm sure we are all shocked especially with the Broncos weird decision not to call a timeout and their weirder decision to kick a 64 yard field goal. Anyways we cover A LOT of football in this episode and Griffin explains why the Packers beatdown is encouraging. Joe goes over why the Steelers win is a big loss and trust me we get into a lot of other topics. TUNE IN!

item.title: EP.51: AARON DONALD, LAMAR JACKSONS CONTRACT, WEEK 1 MATCHUPS, KEVIN DURANT, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: Aaron Donald was caught on film ripping off 2 helmets and swinging them at players heads. What should the NFL do? Lamar is his own agent and wants fully guaranteed money, if he doesn't have a new contract by week one he will stop negotiating. We go through and discuss all the best week one matchups starting with the Bills Vs Rams opening Thursday. Will the KD, Kyrie, and Ben Simmons trio actually work out or will their fragile stability be their downfall? Tune in to find out the answers and much more!

item.title: EP.50: LEBRON IN SEATTLE, KAMARU USMAN, BIG BETS, UPCOMING GIVEAWAY, FANTASY FOOTBALL AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: Lebron James finally made his way out to Seattle and the crowd proves the people of Seattle need the Super Sonics back. Kamaru Usman loses his championship belt. Griffin and Joe get creative with their upcoming bets and announce the coming jersey giveaway for epidsode 52. Tune in for some fantasy football and much more!

item.title: EP.49: PRESEASON STANDOUTS, TOP 100, TRIVIA, MARSHAWN LYNCH, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: Join us as we go over everything that has happened this past week from the rookies showing out to Marshawn Lynch getting dragged out of a car.
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we go over everything that has happened this past week from the rookies showing out to Marshawn Lynch getting dragged out of a car.

item.title: EP.48: TOP FANTASY PICKS, 1 YEAR GIVEAWAY, PAULO VS MURRAY, JAMARR CHASE, AND MUCH MORE!
item.description: In this episode we detail who you should draft in fantasy football by giving you the top players to target at each position, we announce our jersey giveaway for our 52nd (1 year) episode. We talk about the Seattle feud between Paulo Banchero and Dejounte Murray as well as the friendly competition between Jamarr Chase and Justin Jefferson. Tune in to find out more as we discuss several other topics around the NFL also.
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya

Tune in to find out more as we discuss several other topics around the NFL also.

item.title: EP.47: FOOTBALL IS BACK, JULIO JONES, JAGUARS VS RAIDERS, SAM VS BAKER, TRAINING CAMP, AND MUCH MORE
item.description: Football is finally back! I can hear Chris Colinsworth, Tony Romo, Troy Aikman, and Al Michaels ALREADY! If you are as excited as we are, make sure you tune in to this episode and all the episodes from this moment on as we take a step further in this journey and do a deep dive into the NFL season. In this episode we talk about Julio joining Tom Brady and the buccaneers and the impact that may have. The first preseason game where we get to see the #1 overall pick in the draft in action. We predict the winner of the QB battle in Carolina. We discuss what we've seen in training camp so far. We even talk about the upcoming fight with Ryan Garcia and Tank Davis also not forgetting about the NBA with the KD/Jaylen Brown trade rumors. Tune in and subscribe for more to come!

item.description: In this episode we look at both of our favorite NFL teams (Packers and Steelers) and compare them to each other, also predicting our wins and losses from the 2022 opponents. Canelo lost his first fight since Mayweather and we talk about why. Tune in to find out more.

item.description: In this episode we do a deep dive into the 2022 NFL Draft and analyze some of the picks and huge trades that were made. Who had the best draft? Which team got a whole lot better? Who ya got in the second round of the NBA playoffs? Tune in and find out!

item.title: Ep.32: NBA Playoffs, Giveaways, World Cup, Old Stories, and Much More!
item.description: The NBA playoffs are here! We predict the winner of each series, let us know who you think is going all the way. The summer is coming up fast, stay tuned for the official date and time for our one on one's where you can earn some money! We also talk about the World Cup even though we know only what we've learned from Fifa... We take a look back into our high school days and tell hilarious stories.

item.title: Ep.31: NFL Draft Edition, Biggest Risers, Players Who Might Fall, Round One Picks 1-32, and More!
item.description: In this episode we draft all 32 first round picks for each team that has an available pick. This is our most recent mock draft and our second revision. The first round of the draft starts on April 28th and we will keep track of our final mocks compared to what actually happens using a point system we created. The winner gets a case of cider! Tune in to see who your team will draft!

item.title: Ep.30: Bobby Wagner In LA, 11-32 Mock Draft, Wr Vs Cb Three On Three, NCAA Final Four, and Much More!
item.description: Tune in!

item.itunes:summary: Tune in!

item.title: Ep.29: 1-10 Mock Draft, AFC West Bold Prediction, NBA Play In, Tyreek Hill In Miami, Tua, and Much More!
item.description: Mock draft #1 is complete! Were releasing our mock draft 10 picks at a time. The AFC west is loaded with talent and the Chiefs trading Tyreek may have lost them some power in that extremely tough division. Will Shaqstrodomis and Griffin be right about the Lakers if they can get into the play in tournament? Tua was throwing to a track team at Alabama and now he is labeled as a guy with no arm. Am I missing something? Tune in to find out!!!
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya

item.title: Ep.28: Deshaun Watson Trade, Devante Adams, Bakers Next Stop, Steelers Playoff Hopes, and Much More!
item.description: In this episode we go over the blockbuster Deshaun Watson trade and how that shakes up not only the AFC north but the entire NFL. Did the Devante Adams trade actually make Green Bay better? Where will Baker Mayfields next stop be since there are only a couple teams left looking to trade for a QB. Are the Steelers now the worst team in the AFC north or does their defense give them a chance? Stay tuned! This coming week we will release our first mock draft! More things in the works. Follow "Amiwrongpodcast" on Instagram and Tik Tok and "amiwrong2019" on Twitter for more updates!

item.title: Ep.27: Aaron Rodgers Deal, Lebron James, Steelers QB, Russell Wilson, Mack and Bosa, and Much More!
item.description: It has been an insane week of sports! This episode was recorded on Sunday so keep that in mind when listening. Lebron James leading the NBA in scoring, packers signing Rodgers and tagging Adams, Wilson and Wentz getting traded, Wagner getting released. The list goes on and on and we have a lot to talk about!

item.title: Ep. 26: Face of the NBA, Combine Standouts, Jordan Vs Kobe, and Much More!
item.description: Our first video podcast! We argue about our all time 5 on 5 teams again. We discuss who will be the future face of the NBA after Lebron James retires. We check in on our sleeper picks, see who made the biggest draft leap, and who the biggest combine surprise was. MJ vs Kobe also was a big topic of discussion.

item.title: Ep.25: All Time 5 on 5, Best Team In The East, Draft Sleepers, and Much More!

We also discuss our pick for the team to come out of the east. We all know about the top draft prospects but what about the sleepers? Tune in to find out more!

item.title: Ep.20: NFL Playoff Edition Pt.2, Packers Loss, Bengals Upset, Rams Home Stretch, and Much More!
item.description: Everything NFL playoffs will be analyzed and discussed in this podcast along with bets and also tips and tricks for coping with the pain of your team losing in the playoffs.
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
item.itunes:summary: Everything NFL playoffs will be analyzed and discussed in this podcast along with bets and also tips and tricks for coping with the pain of your team losing in the playoffs.

item.title: Ep.19: NFL Playoff Edition! Cowboys Last Play, Deebo, How Far Can Burrow Take The Bengals, Key Matchups, and Much More
item.description: In this episode we do a recap of every wildcard game and breakdown the good and the bad of every game. We also predict and bet on the upcoming playoff matchups.
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya

item.title: Ep.18: NFL Playoff Preview, Klay's Comeback, Russell Wilsons Future, Alabama vs Georgia, and Much More!
item.description: Joe won his first bet! He now owes Griffin only six cases of hard cider. The NFL playoffs are now here and its win or go home, the most intense time of year. Would Wilson be a perfect fit for Pittsburg? Klay is back like he never left. Will Georgia win the SEC rematch? Or will Alabama reclaim their throne?
item.dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya

item.title: Ep.17: Burrow and Chase, Packers Clinch #1, Antonio Brown, Georgia vs Alabama, Playoff picture, and More!
item.description: It was a wild weekend, nothing more wild than AB walking out mid-game. Joe Burrow and Jamarr Chase are putting up insane numbers. The Packers starters have about 3 weeks off, how will that affect them? Tune in for more!

item.title: Ep.16 Lakers Struggles, Cowboys, Chiefs Biggest Threat, Justin Jefferson, Score Predictions, and More.
item.description: Is Russell Westbrook the root of the Lakers problems? Are the Cowboys an actual Super Bowl contender this season? Who is the biggest threat to knock off the Chiefs? Justin Jefferson has the most receiving yards in NFL history in his first two seasons with 2 games left to play. Does he have what it takes to be the best WR ever?

item.title: Ep.15: Jake Paul, Urban Meyer, Lions Beat Arizona, NFL Playoff Picture, Steelers Chances, and More.
item.description: Jake Paul has been impressive albeit against much smaller guys that aren't boxers. Its about time he chooses the right fight. Urban Meyer gets his long overdue firing. Can he go back to becoming an NCAA powerhouse? This is Green Bays Super Bowl to lose as they are undoubtedly atop the NFL. Tune in for more!

item.description: It was a wild weekend and Griffin remains undefeated in his bets against Joe. How will Klay Thompson fit back in with the Warriors after two years injured? Can anyone beat Alabama for the national championship? Can the Steelers sneak into the playoffs? Tune in!!

item.title: Ep.12: Lincoln Riley to USC, Steelers Next QB, WSU Dominance, Georgia Vs Alabama Preview, Packers, Patriots Hot Streak and More.
item.description: Lincoln Riley claims he is going to make USC the mecca of college football and he is more than capable. The steelers playoff hopes are very slim and its time for them to be on the QB hunt. Is this the start of Jayden De Laura and WSU dominance over UW? Packers game review, how far can the patriots take this, and more.

item.title: Ep.11: Apple Cup Preview, Packers Loss, Jonathan Taylor, Buffalo Bills Struggles, and More.
item.description: Happy Thanksgiving everyone! In this episode we talk about our apple cup predictions, what the packers loss means for them, Jonathan Taylor's huge game, are the bills contenders or pretenders amidst their recent struggles, and much more.

item.title: Ep.8: Packers Power Rank, Steelers Playoff Hopes, Derrick Henry, Music and more.
item.description: Today we asked ourselves if the Packers are the best team in the NFL, do the steelers still have a shot in the playoffs, and what do the Titans have to do to win games without their star RB. We dive a little bit into the music industry and GOAT debates also.

item.title: Ep.7: Chiefs Playoff Chances, Lakers Struggles, Packers vs Cardinals Preview, and More
item.description: The sports world is buzzing as the NFL and NBAs top teams (Chiefs and Lakers) are off to rocky starts. Can they turn it around and contend for a championship? Can Green Bay end the cardinals 7-0 win streak without their top players? Tune in to this episode to find out more!

item.title: Ep.6: Steelers Vs Seahawks OT, Packers Defense, Trevon Diggs, Kyler Vs Lamar, Jets or Jags, and More
item.description: In todays episode we talk about the steelers thriller win in overtime vs Seattle, the packers defense and their tough road ahead, Trevon Diggs ranking among other elite corners, Kyler or Lamar starting a new franchise, and who is worse? Jets or Jags?

item.title: Ep.5: Seahawks Playoff Hopes, Wilder Vs Fury 3, Packers Field Goal Fiasco, Jersey Giveaway, and More.
item.description: In this weeks episode we had slight technical difficulties with the microphones so this is the audio straight from the laptop. We talk about our 2 jersey giveaway starting NOW, wilder getting knocked out and his potential future opponents. The packers missing a total of four kicks but still somehow winning, and if the Seahawks have enough to survive without Russell Wilson.

item.title: Ep.4: Giveaway Update, Packers Vs Steelers, Fury Vs Wilder 3, Seahawks Win, Heartbreaking Oregon Loss, and More.
item.description: 100 listener giveaway updates. TWO winners get a jersey of their choice from any sport, team, or player. Are the packers better than the steelers all around? Will the pac 12 be represented in the CFP any time soon? Tune in for another great episode.

item.title: Ep.3: Special Guest Michael Richardson, Seahawks Blowout, Packers Big Win, Rams Vs Bucs, Game Bets, Giveaways, and More
item.description: In this episode we have Mike Rich on as our guest where we discuss the life of a college athlete and embarrassing football stories. Before that we talk about the Packers and Rams superbowl aspirations along with the key to the vikings blowout win over the Seahawks. And don't forget about our 100 listener giveaway!

item.title: Ep.1: Packers Blowout, Steelers Comeback, Apple Cup Predictions, Rookie Debuts, and More.
item.description: In this episode we discuss how the packers will bounce back from their embarrassing loss and how impressive the steelers comeback was. This could also be the year WSU beats UW in the apple cup. We later discuss Trevor Lawrence, Zach Wilson, Trey Lance, Justin Fields, and even Joe Tryon.
